alert.note: Alert for Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CAMBRIA COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lilly, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portage, Cresson, Sankertown, Cassandra, Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site and Mt. Aloysius College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
